chapters.title: Chapter 10: A Saying in the Borderlands
chapters.info: Jancy Torfinn, p. 201 (275)—High-voiced girl from Emond's Field. She comes with Verin and Alanna to become Aes Sedai. She is about fourteen years old, the youngest of the girls who came with Verin and Alanna. She has the spark inborn; she will channel whether she is taught or not.
